title: Pushpa Vanam Ring - A Floral Symphony of Gemstones
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features vibrant orange Sapphires with heart cut at the center and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) accents throughout. The gold boasts a warm
rich luster indicative of fine South Indian craftsmanship.
features: This striking ring showcases a floral motif, expertly handcrafted with intricate detailing. The heart cut sapphires form the central flower, complemented by a halo of sparkling CZs. The openwork design creates depth and allows light to dance through the stones, enhancing their brilliance. The overall design blends traditional floral elements with a modern, bold aesthetic.
colors: Radiant gold is accented by the fiery orange of the Sapphires and the dazzling white of the CZs
creating a warm and captivating color palette.
occasions: or any event where you want to make a statement. Equally suitable for adding a touch of glamour to your evening wear.
description: This Pushpa Vanam Ring is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The vibrant Sapphires and sparkling CZs are carefully selected for their quality and brilliance. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's natural luster, ensuring a lasting shine. Its unique floral design makes it a truly special piece that will be treasured for years to come.
